sub_title: Proven success in Management, IoT, Telecommunication, Customer Support, Agile, Security, Consultancy, and Project Management.
summary:
Hello, I’m Remco! I am skilled in developing and implementing customer-oriented IT strategies and systems while building teams from the ground up and reducing expenses to ensure strong budgeting and the company’s ability to use technology for utmost efficiency. Known for driving integrity, excellent process improvement initiatives, and strong team leadership. As an articulate communicator and independent worker, able to complete projects with little/no guidance, following delegated tasks. I am multilingual; fluent in Dutch and English with basic knowledge of German, French, Spanish and Swedish.

My diverse experience and in field expertise in management, IoT, telecommunication, agile, security, consultancy, and project management have allowed me great career growth. However, I am now looking for a new position offering greater challenges. With sharp organisational skills, careful attention to detail, and my ability to work with speed and accuracy, I will be a valuable asset to your team.

Please feel free to contact me at remco.hekker@live.com with any thoughts, comments, or questions about my work—I’m always interested in making new professional acquaintances.”
